msbt.message: I ask everybody on the island about the stuff they like. Can I ask what's your favorite stuff?
I wanna be friends with everybody on the island. So I wanna learn everything about everyone!
Sowhat do I wanna know first Hmm
Good! 'Cause I gotta tell ya, I was chatting with the other day, and I told 'em"Man, didja know likes ?" I'm glad I got it right, !
OK. Whew! I tell ya, I was chatting with the other day, and I told 'em" is all about the ." Glad I got it right, !
Remember when I asked you about and you said I'd like ? Still think so?
Nice! See, the thing is, I was chilling with and I said"Man, that really likes " I'm glad I was right.
Hey, ! Remember that thing you told me the other day?and how out of all , that's your top pick. Is it still that way?
Yay! I was chatting with the other day, and I saidDidja know is real into ? I'm glad nothing's changed!
Hi, ! Remember how you told me that stuff the other day? About how your dream's to become ? Is that still your deal?
That's cool! I was snacking with the other day, and I told 'em all about itI'm glad I wasn't wrong! I woulda looked like I didn't know what I was talking about, .
Hey, ! Remember that thing you told me the other day?About your dream to be all -y? Is that still your deal, ?
OK, whew! I gotta tell ya, I was chatting with the other day, andI said stuff about your dreams! Good thing I got your life goals in order. That coulda been embarrassing!
Hey, . Remember that stuff you told me the other day? About your hobbies?That thing about how your hobby is ? Is that still what you got going on?
Neat! I was doing the chatting thing with and I mentioned your hobby.I was worried I might've told them the wrong thing, .
Hey, ! Remember when ya told me your hobby is? Is that still your thing, ?
OK! The other day, I was snacking with and talked about your hobby.I'm glad it didn't change I woulda looked like I didn't know what I was talking about!
Hi, . Ya know that stuff you told me the other day?How your skill is ? Is that still what your deal is?
Cool! I was chilling with the other dayAnd I was talking about your skill I was worried it might've changed!
Hey, ! Remember that thing you told me the other day?That you're all skilled at ? Is that still the deal?
Cool! I was chatting with and told them about your skillI was worried it might've changed, and I'd be wrong, !
Hi, ! I heard some folks talking the other day
Soyou like more than any other kinds of ? Is that right?
Yeah, YUMMY!We gotta snack and talk about sometime!
, huh? Man, I dunno nothin' about that stuff, but it feels realyou.You gotta tell me all about sometime!
?! Oh man, we have gotta talk !
, huh I dunno much about that stuff, but ya oughta tell me about it sometime.
I heard that outta all , you like most. Is that REALLY true?
Yeah! There ain't nothing like , is there?
. Guess there's still a buncha yummy stuff out there I don't know about.Ya gotta tell me more about sometime!
Is really one of your favorite ?
Yes! There's nothing better than , right?

Ooh, . I bet it's yummy since you like it.Ya gotta tell me more about
sometime, !
Is it true your dream is to become ?
! Man, I've got some opinions on that front. One guy said I was "problematic." I dunno.
That's real you, .Tell me about it sometime!
Is your dream still to be a crazy cool ?
So neat. Justreal neat. I mean <10_4 />Sorry. I got distracted.I started wondering where cheese comes from and I kinda tuned everything else out.
, huh? There's still so much I dunno about!Ya gotta tell me more about that sometime, !
Is it true that your hobby is ?
yeah, I can see that. It's real you.You gotta tell me more about this thing sometime!
Is it true that your hobby is ?
? I know about .You'd say, "What?! No way!" if you knew how much I know about .
Huh. There's still so much stuff that I dunno about!Tell me more about this whole thing sometime, !
Is it true that your skill is ?
? That's real you, .Tell me more about this thing sometime, !
Is it true that your big skill is ?
That's great, a huh huh huh. I've always loved to talk about !
, huh There's still so much stuff I dunno about!I wanna hear all about this whole thing sometime, !
I heard you're not very interested in music and don't listen to much. Is that true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
I heard you're not very interested in books and don't read much. Is that true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
I heard you're not very interested in comics and don't read many. Is that true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
I heard you're not real interested in movies and don't watch much. Is that true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
I heard ya don't watch TV. Is that true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
I heard you're not real interested in sports. Is that true?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
I heard you don't have a favorite tasty beverage. Is that true?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
I heard ya don't have a food that you love more than anything. Is that true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Is it true you still don't have a dream job ya wanna do?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
I heard you don't have a hobby. Is that true?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Is it true you think you don't have any skills you can brag about, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
That's cool, dude. I just asked 'cause I was curious. No worries.
Wait, really?! Huh. Maybe I mis-listened.
That's not right. Wait a second...
Oh! Not that. Can you tell me one more time, ?
So you DO still want to be !
So you ARE still good at !
So you ARE still good at !
So it's still the same! I knew it was, but the bugs in my house were all "I dunno, man!" I'll show them!
Do you listen to music? What kinda music makes you real happy, ?
Oh yeah? What're ya jammin' to now, ?
Cartoon themes are great. I really like 'em too. When I watch cartoons, I always yell along!
Samba music? Yeah! I listen to it too! When I'm feeling down, I put on some samba and dance till I fall over.

Choral music? That's good stuff. Ever notice how it's in a lotta movies? Likea LOTTA movies.It's always like, if a spooky thing is happening, then the choir goes WUUUUUUUUH BIIWUIIIIWAAAA If it's a fast and exciting thing, the choir is all MELOMELOMELO HOOOO WWWAAAAKOAAAAA FRAAAAMP!I like to sing along, sometimes. Especially if I've seen the movie a bunch and know all the words.
? Nice! Now I know another thing about you, !
That's cool. Music or not, we all gotta find the noise that makes us happy, ya know?
What kinda books do you like to read, ?
Oh? Well, what kinda books do you read now, ?
What kinda books do you read now?
Picture books are great! I love that you can just look at the pictures and get the story.They're like movies, but they go slow enough that I don't have to keep asking what just happened!

Yeah, comic books! So full of deep stories. Likewhen the super folks punch each other!Or when one super dude says, "This ends now!" and you think, "This is gonna end now! Probably!"Except it doesn't end then! It just goes on and on and on and on and on and on and onfor decades!So cool, !

I love field guides 'cause I dunno nothin' about fields. But now I can pretend like I do.With a field guide, I can look and say, "Oh. It's wheat." Or, "Look how tall the soybeans are this year, Becky."I gotta hear what kinda field guides you like sometime! I'd love to learn about cornor even soccer!
? ! OK, I've memorized it!I'm gonna try reading some too. Sounds like it could be a real good time, .
That's cool. Maybe you use books as pillows, like I do!
What kinda comics do you like to read, ?
Into something else now? Well, what kinda comics do you read now?
What kinda comics do you read now, ?

Comics about food?! Oh man. Comic artists that draw good food are so amazing. I just sit and stareThen my tummy gets all rumbly, and my mouth goes all droolyPretty soon, I'm biting pages and growling and complaining about how it doesn't taste as good as it looks!
Fantasy comics are one of my favorites too, a huh huh!I wanted to be a wizard when I grew up, so I studied a lotta books full of spells that'd summon yummy food!It turned out they were all cookbooks.

Science fiction? Nice. Those comics always remind me of the adventures I used to do back when I was a kid.I'd travel through time, and yell at dinosaurs, and make friends with aliens, and play pranks on future me.One time, I traveled to the future and told future me "there's a dessert island you can move to!"I made me think was a "dessert" island, not a "deserted" island, so heI Oh no.? <10_4 />Can Ihave a few minutes alone.<10_4 /> Thanks.
, huh? That sounds cool. And it's real neat you're into those comics becauseWe can talk about 'em after I read some, !
Ooh, that's cool. Yeah, a lotta people got things they enjoy more than comics, .
Do you watch movies? What kinda movies do you like, ?
Well, what kinda movies do you like to watch now, ?
What kinda movies do you like to watch now, ?

Oh man, anime movies are my favorite too! I like the ones with big stompy robots!I always wanted to pilot a big stompy robot and save the world from bad guy stompy robots!But there's never any job openings. So I'll just watch the movies, .

Fantasy movies are great. I always thought it'd be cool to train and be the Warrior Guy!I'd chill with fairies and gnomes, and ride on dragons, and eat fantasy world snacks Then maybe I'd rescue somebody from something, !
Comedy movies! Nothing makes me laugh more than comedy!I gotta be careful, though! 'Cause sometimes I laugh so hard I reverse eat
Maybe I'll try watching that.I'm gonna make some popcorn, get some juice, and put a movie in my brain!
That's cool. I get sleepy during movies too. Nobody should ever have to sit still for ninety minutes.
Do you watch TV? What kinda shows are you into, ?
Oh yeah? What kinda shows do you watch now, ?
What kinda TV shows do you watch now, ?
Anime shows! Those are my favorite too, I watch 'em all the time!I like to stand on my head when I watch anime. A friend of mine watches cooking shows that wayBut that's just weird, .

Cooking shows! Me too, me too! Old, new, reenactments, interviews, mystery foods, stunts, all of 'em!I just stare at the screen and drool. Food gets turned into other food Every episode's like a magic show.My tummy makes noises if I watch those shows before I eat. So I just snack my way through every show!
Quiz shows are so fun! I like to watch 'em and try to guess the answers.I just yell whatever I think of, and if I get a question right, I do my happy dance in front of the TV!
? Huh, I've never heard of it. Maybe I should give it a shot!I bet it's real fun since you're into it, .
I hear ya. And I'd be real happy if it's because you like talking to me more than TV, .
Are you into sports? Do you got a favorite? Playing or watching, either one, .
Huh? You like other stuff? What do you like now, ?
Which one do you like now?
Table tennis is way harder than it seems.I got all dizzy chasing the ball with my eyes, !

Ooh, volleyball! That's the one like tennis, except the net is taller, right?I'm not very good at it. I can never get my face in front of the ball in time to hit it back!But if ya invite me to a game, I'll be your cheerleader, !
Ooh, swimming! I love swimming! I swim all day long sometimes!I sit in a floatie in my bathtub and snack until the water is too crumby. Those are the best days

Ooh, ! Man, is so cool. So cool.My favorite part is when you do the thing! And then you do the other thing you do, and people cheer!I dig so much, I'm gonna look it up so I can explain why I think it's awesome.
Man, that's cool. You're not a sports person. Getting shoved around by sweaty folks ain't for everyone.
What's your favorite beverage? I wanna know what you think I oughta drink, .
You've got a new favorite? Tell me! What is it now, ?
So what's your new favorite beverage, then, ?
Man, milk is tasty. If ya got a bunch, you can fill up the tub and pretend you're a cookie getting dunked!Don't do that though. You'll have hair in your cereal all week.
Fruit juice! Yay, fruit juice! It's nature's water! I love fresh-squeezed juice!
Ooh, cocoa. Cocooooooa. I feel warm and happy and warm just thinking about sniffing it.
Ooh, ! I shoulda known that you'd know about something like that.You probably got one of those "refined taste" thingies I keep meaning to try. You're so cool.
Hey, that's cool. I think any kinda tasty drink is my favorite.
What's your favorite food? I wanna know what you like in case I've never had it. Then I can try some!
Huh? You got a new favorite? What is it now, ?

Ooh, stew! What do you put in your stew? I knew a guy named Stu who made stew. He called it Stu's Stew.Stu's brother, Hugh, said Stu's Stew made him spew. Stu told Hugh that Hugh's cordon bleu tasted like glue.I liked Stu's stew, even if it had some shoe in a bite or two. But Stu was right about Hugh's cordon bleu.

Pizza.<10_4 /> Pizza is yes.<10_4 /> You knowa lot of the time, I say goofy stuff. Or I make a joke. Not now. Pizzais yes.And lemme tell ya something. A lotta folks say, "Oh, gross! Pineapple on pizza!" They're just followers.Hating pineapple on pizza is trendy. Like saying you're afraid of clowns, or grossed out by the word "moist."Nobody is any of those things. Someone said it, and other folks repeated it., you're better than that. Be your own person. Know the truth about pizzaPizza's whatever toppings ya love, manonions, peppers, pineapple, moist clowns, and hot, melty cheese.Pizza's a dream we sing to ourselves<10_4 /> Pizza. Is. Yes.
Mmmm, donuts! Nothing better than a donut, a big glass of milk, and a sunny morning.We gotta get donuts sometime. A dozen apieceand a couple gallons of milkMMMMM!
Ooh, . Just the name screams, "YUMMY."I knew you'd know about some tasty trendy food, !
Hey, that's cool. It's hard to have a favorite when the world's fulla yummy food, !
Do you have a "dream"? Y'know, like a thing ya wanna be when ya grow up, ?
Huh? It's different from what you said before? So what's your dream gig now, ?
So what's your dream to become now, ?

Ooh, a ptissier! That's a fancy word for "pastry chef." Pastries are fancy, so always use the fancy word.I'll be the person who taste-tests your pastries! The fancy name for that is ptissier-nommr!So I'm gonna need you to call me the very SECOND you do a ptissier so I can ptissier-nommr, !
A comic artist? That's such a cool dream! Consider me your first fan!

Whoa, a doctor! That's an awesome dream to have, .I bet you'll make it too. You're such a hard worker, and you probably know where to buy a lab coat.Yep, Doctor has a real nice ring to it.<10_4 /> By the way, my knee has been kinda sore lately
Ooooh, ! That's a great dream.I bet you'll pull it off too. I'm rootin' for ya, !
No sweat! I'm the same. I wanna be so much stuff, I can't figure out where to start.Don't worry! We'll figure it out, and we'll both be real neat folks, !
What's your hobby? Ya know, what's a thing you really enjoy doing?
Huh? It's different? What's your hobby now?
Oh man. What's your hobby now?
Man, drawing pictures is real fun! I'd love to see some of your drawings, !I like to draw anywhere! At the table, on the couch, on the toilet, in the garageanywhere, !
Ooh, singing! I bet you're real good at it, .I don't sing, really. I burp different notes. I'm pretty good too! We gotta do a song together sometime!
Ooh, cooking. That's why you always smell so good, !Lemme know if you ever need a taste-tester, OK?
Whoa, ?! Oh man, I've never tried that. It sounds amazing.
That's cool. That just means you enjoy all the stuff that you do!
Do you have a skill? A thing you're best at? Mine's unhinging my jaw to swallow my snack bags whole!
Huh? Do you have a new skill? Tell me what your new skill is, !
Oh man! Can ya tell me what your new skill is, ?
Drawing pictures?! That's neat-o! I didn't know you were good at drawing, .Can ya draw a picture of me? Make me look like a superhero, OK?<10_4 /> Like I always do, !
Ooh, singing! I bet your voice is real pretty when you sing! I love singing too. Check it outLA LA LA LA LA LA LA LA LA LA LA! I know I'm not as good as you, but I try my hardest, .
Cooking! You know how to cook?! Like, the real-deal, cooking-food- that-you-can-eat kinda cooking?!Oh man. I knew I liked you. I wanna try your cooking! And maybe also give you a hug, .
, huh? That's really cool. You oughta show folks what ya can do!
Ahh, come on! I bet you actually have a crazy skill you just don't know that you have, .
